resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up
Phone number name cannot be empty
Meatless meals are not just tasty they are also kind to the planet, so dig in and feel good about what you are eating!
Say goodbye to plastic and hello to paper using paper bags for shopping is an easy way to reduce waste and make a difference for the environment.
Support your local farmers and the planet by buying fresh produce from the farmers market – it is a tasty way to make a difference!
Ditch the disposable straws and cutlery – be the coolest eco-warrior around by carrying your own metal straw and cutlery wherever you go
Why ride solo when you can carpool and save the planet? Together, we can make a difference on the road!
Get a leg up on the competition – and the environment – by cycling to your destination! It is good for your health and the planets health.
Leave your car behind and put one foot in front of the other – walking to work is good for your health and the planets health
Why sit in traffic when you can take public transport and save the planet? Plan your journey and leave a smaller carbon footprint behind
Turn off the lights, save the Earth.. or just save on your electric bill, whichever you prefer.
Save energy and feed your brain by curling up with a good book instead of turning on the TV!
Stay cool and save energy with a smart thermostat – its like having your own personal temperature genie!
Washing at a colder temperature is not just good for your clothes, its also good for the planet – its a win-win for all!
Every flush counts – save water (and money) by only flushing when its really necessary!
Get in, get clean, get out – quick showers not only save water, but they will also help you get out the door faster in the morning!
Tap into your inner conservationist – turn off the taps when you are not using water and save a drop (or two) for the planet!
Think outside the spout – a rain barrel is a great way to collect and conserve water (and save a buck or two on your water bill).
Take a walk on the green side – walking to exercise is good for your health, the planets health, and your wallet (no gas needed!).
Sweat it out for the planet – walk to the gym instead of driving and get a workout for your body and the environment!
Stay hydrated and save the planet – ditch disposable water bottles and carry your own reusable bottle instead!
Pump up your environmental impact – use free weights instead of machines at the gym and save energy (and get a better workout too!).

Are you sure you want to sign out and close the application?
You have to buy the subscription in order to proceed.
